title: Bug 3666 - Code Completion Hungry code assist
OB: When adding a parameter to the baz call in the bar method, the code assist replaces too much code. Specifically, the code is changed to: baz(x.foo().foo()) instead of baz(x.foo()x.foo()).
EB: When adding a parameter to the baz call in the bar method, the code assist should replace the code until the cursor location (x.foo()) instead of replacing until the end of the current identifier (x.foo().foo()).
